text: Prime Minister Sharon, Prime Minister Abbas, I urge you today to end the designs of those who seek destruction, annihilation and occupation, and I urge you to have the will and the courage to begin to realize our dreams of peace, prosperity and coexistence.
author: King Abdullah II

text: We have peace with Israel. We're actually the last man standing. So there is going to be immense pressure and people asking, 'Why are we having this relationship when it's not benefiting anybody?' Obviously, my answer is you always benefit from peace.
author: King Abdullah II

text: Peace with Israel is a strategic imperative for Jordan.
author: King Abdullah II

text: I don't think there's anything more important than making peace before it's too late. And it almost always falls to the child to try to move toward the parent.
author: Jane Fonda

text: Civilization is a failure. We need to think what we can do together in love and peace.
author: Serj Tankian
